item.title: Video Editor for TikTok/Shorts/Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Our team at The Daily Ratings Podcast is looking for a short form video editor!

Currently we are looking to partner with an editor to add video and on-screen text in a finished product able to be posted to TikTok/YouTube Shorts/Instagram Reels.

We run a film podcast and are at 130+ episodes.
Thedailyratings.com
Find us on Spotify and Apple as well
https://linktr.ee/thedailyratings

The work flow we are suggesting is providing our episodes/streams. The first few batches we will be providing highlight clips from the episodes, but ideally the work flow becomes Us providing the entire episode, and you finding what clips work best.

Once in your hands we want to find relevant movie clips to edit together a visual, based on what we are discussing. Then in typical TikTok style, edit visual caption/text from the audio. Each episode we cover multiple movies, so will be looking to have 3-5 videos per episode.

The plan is to have the same single short video posted to the 3 platforms listed above. We are aiming to post a minimum of 2-4 videos a week, but are looking to partner with an editor to possibly grow that frequency.  We also would love to see any new content ideas, beyond chopping up our episodes, possibly for any trends we can quickly act on.

Lastly, see below for some sample edits that have done well on our Socials. These are the examples we would like to have a baseline, but of course open to different styles and input.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6RWcjsppVN/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7EvH3RpNGc/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/CuHgI5ZsEB2/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/CuZ7xnkAT3A/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

We look forward to speaking with you all!


Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 17:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Dialogue Editing, Video Annotation, Social Video Enhancement, CapCut, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Windows Movie Maker, Sony Vegas, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Dialogue Editing, Video Annotation, Social Video Enhancement, CapCut, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Windows Movie Maker, Sony Vegas, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
